# meshcli

A CLI tool for mesh operations.

## Installation

```bash
uv pip install -e .
```

## Usage

```bash
meshcli --help
```

## Development

Install development dependencies:

```bash
uv sync --dev
```

Run tests:

```bash
uv run pytest
```

Format code:

```bash
uv run black .
```

Lint code:

```bash
uv run flake8
```
# meshcli
